title: Patch Notes
content: inventory can now be used when rolling in dialogues. Neutral and friendly NPCs will no longer become hostile when, outside of combat, they walk into surfaces created during combat that trigger passives (like electrified surfaces triggering Thunderbolt Strike). Take it easy, lads. Fixed Freecast being reset when any condition is applied. Fixed characters getting stuck when pathfinding via a ladder that's already in use by another companion. Fixed a bug with the moving platform in the Gauntlet of
